value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07076v1", "title": "On Fundamental Theorems of Super Invariant Theory", "summary": "The purpose of this paper is to prove the First and Second Fundamental\nTheorems of invariant theory for the complex special linear supergroup and\ndiscuss the superalgebra of invariants, via the super Plucker relations.", "main_category": "math.RA", "categories": "math.RA", "published": "2025-04-09T17:47:55Z"}
